**Story**

- As a [user], I want [capability]

**Requirements**

- [ ] Requirement 1
- [ ] Requirement 2
- [ ] Requirement 3

**Acceptance Criteria**

- [ ] Given [context], when [action], then [result]
- [ ] Given [context], when [action], then [result]
